name: Post-Op Nutrition

name: Returning to Work
description: Plan your phased return to work with ergonomic tips, employer communication guidelines, and stress-management strategies.

name: Emotional Wellbeing
description: Explore techniques for coping with stress, anxiety, and mood swings after surgery, including mindfulness exercises, journaling prompts, and peer support resources.

name: Exercise
description: Discover safe, doctor-approved exercise routines and mobility tips designed to rebuild strength, improve flexibility, and enhance your overall physical recovery.
